import React,{useEffect,useState}from'react';import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const DashboardAdmin=()=>{const[stats,setStats]=useState(null);useEffect(()=>{const token=localStorage.getItem('token');fetch('http://localhost:3000/api/dashboard/admin',{headers:{Authorization:"Bearer ".concat(token)}}).then(res=>res.json()).then(data=>setStats(data));},[]);if(!stats)return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("p",{className:"p-4",children:"Chargement..."});return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"p-6",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h1",{className:"text-2xl font-bold text-blue-700 mb-4",children:"Dashboard Admin"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("p",{className:"mb-2",children:["\uD83D\uDC64 Utilisateurs : ",stats.stats.users]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("p",{className:"mb-2",children:["\uD83C\uDFE2 Entreprises : ",stats.stats.entreprises]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("p",{className:"mb-2",children:["\uD83C\uDFDB\uFE0F Minist\xE8res : ",stats.stats.ministeres]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("p",{className:"mb-2",children:["\uD83D\uDCC4 Offres : ",stats.stats.offers]})]});};export default DashboardAdmin;
